mod-api.description: Public API for Spawnie. Exposes run(), execute(), spawn() functions. Unifies tasks as single-step workflows.

mod-tracker.description: Central state tracker for all workflows and tasks. Persists to ~/.spawnie/tracker.json. Handles timeouts, orphan detection, stats tracking.

mod-workflow.description: Workflow definition and execution. Parses JSON workflows, resolves dependencies, executes steps in parallel where possible.

mod-registry.description: Model registry and routing. Maps model names to providers, handles fallback chains.

mod-session.description: Interactive shell sessions. Spawns CLI agents with bidirectional communication (questions, progress, done signals).

mod-monitor.description: Real-time TUI monitor using Textual. Shows workflows, tasks, alerts, stats.

mod-main.description: CLI entry point. Defines all commands: run, workflow, workflows, status, monitor, kill, etc.

mod-providers-base.description: Abstract base class for CLI providers. Handles prompt execution via command line or stdin.

mod-providers-claude.description: Claude CLI provider. Executes prompts via 'claude' command with proper arguments.

mod-findings.description: Structured findings format for code quality analysis. Dataclasses for Finding, Evidence, CodeReference, SuggestedFix.
